title: Thriven - Bag of Scumbags
description:
Thriven is a Brazilian independent Alternative Metal band with influences of Heavy Metal, Metalcore, Sludge Metal, Southern Rock and Rock Art.

Here we have a disk that can generate those feelings known to 'love' and 'hate' ... In Active since 2008, the Thriven is a newbie on the scene of Campinas (SP), but already has made great strides towards defining their musical identity, which was already noticeable in caprichadÃƒÂ­ssimo EP "Purecavespringwater" (08). Since then, the band recruited two musicians and expanded horizons for the design of their first full album, "Bag Of Scumbags". 

Source: Review - Bag Of Scumbags - Thriven http://whiplash.net/materias/cds/154066-thriven.html # ixzz38E0sQZ7Z
